content.rendered:
An Unforgettable Evening!

Gottwals Books owner Shane Gottwals is seen here with author Eric Metaxas and Governor Sonny Perdue at Monday night’s benefit for Covenant Care in Macon, GA. Gottwals Books helped raise hundreds of dollars for the ministry through the sale of Eric Metaxas’s books that night!

Great NEW Non-Fiction for Young Readers!

Biographies for kids have never been so much fun! The Who Was? (and Who Is?) biography series for young readers features historical and modern-day figures. Their life stories and achievements are presented in a fun and engaging way for leisure reading, and the factually accurate books can also be used for school lessons and projects.

Featured personalities include include Ben Franklin, Louis Armstrong, Maria Tallchief, Bill Gates, Jane Goodall and many more!

Each Gottwals has just stocked a great selection of brand new Who? titles for $3.97 each. Check out the special display at your favorite Gottwals Books.

Did You Know?

In addition to traditional biographies and memoirs, you can find travelogues, personal essays, oral histories, adventure diaries and blog-to-book titles at Gottwals. Our associates can help you find books written by (or about) your favorite person from history, literature, or pop culture.

Toys of the Week

Soft Activity Book: Firefighter Fred to the Rescue: $9.97 

Flip the flap to help Firefighter Fred save the day! This squeaking, sliding, lift-the-flap cloth activity book from Melissa & Doug K’s Kids is packed with low-tech, high-impact novelties and is durably constructed to last through story time, playtime, and the washing machine, too!
